00030 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, double red, double green, double blue)
00031     :   x_(x), y_(y), red_(red), green_(green), blue_(blue), isForeground_(true), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_RGB)
00032 {
00033     grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red) + (0.59 * green) + (0.11 * blue);

00046 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, bool isForeground)
00047     :   x_(x), y_(y), isForeground_(isForeground), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC)
00048 {
00049     if ( isForeground )
00050     {
00051         grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00052         red_ = 0.0;
00053         green_ = 0.0;
00054         blue_ = 0.0;
00055     }
00056     else
00057     {
00058         grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00059         red_ = 1.0;
00060         green_ = 1.0;
00061         blue_ = 1.0;
00062     }
00063 };

00120 void Pixel::grayLevel (double grayLevel)
00121 {
00122     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_GRAYSCALE )
00123     {
00124         if ( grayLevel < 0.0 )
00125             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00126         else
00127         {
00128             if ( grayLevel > 1.0 )
00129                 grayLevel = 1.0;
00130             else
00131                 grayLevel_ = grayLevel;
00132         }
00133         
00134         isForeground_ = true;
00135         red_ = 0.0;
00136         green_ = 0.0;
00137         blue_ = 0.0;
00138     }
00139 };

00146 void Pixel::red (double value)
00147 {
00148     if ( value < 0.0 )
00149         red_ = 0.0;
00150     else
00151     {
00152         if ( value > 1.0 )
00153             red_ = 1.0;
00154         else
00155             red_ = value;
00156     }
00157 
00158     // Compute the grayscale equivalent value
00159     grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00160 };

00241 void Pixel::setColor (double red, double green, double blue)
00242 {
00243     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_RGB )
00244     {
00245         if ( red < 0.0 )
00246             red_ = 0.0;
00247         else
00248         {
00249             if ( red > 1.0 )
00250                 red_ = 1.0;
00251             else
00252                 red_ = red;
00253         }
00254         
00255         if ( green < 0.0 )
00256             green_ = 0.0;
00257         else
00258         {
00259             if ( green > 1.0 )
00260                 green_ = 1.0;
00261             else
00262                 green_ = green;
00263         }
00264         
00265         if ( blue < 0.0 )
00266             blue_ = 0.0;
00267         else
00268         {
00269             if ( blue > 1.0 )
00270                 blue_ = 1.0;
00271             else
00272                 blue_ = blue;
00273         }
00274         
00275         // Set the other representations
00276         grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00277         isForeground_ = true;
00278     }
00279 };

00303 void Pixel::isForeground (bool isForeground)
00304 {
00305     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC )
00306     {
00307         isForeground_ = isForeground;
00308         
00309         if ( isForeground_ )
00310         {
00311             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00312             red_ = 0.0;
00313             green_ = 0.0;
00314             blue_ = 0.0;
00315         }
00316         else
00317         {
00318             grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00319             red_ = 1.0;
00320             green_ = 1.0;
00321             blue_ = 1.0;
00322         }
00323     }
00324         
00325 };
